name: Shortcutters
description: In this game, the player is thrown into a dungeon with an AI monster that follows the player and tries to destroy them. The player’s only way to out-maneuver the monster is by using shortcuts that the monster can’t follow. These shortcuts buy the player enough time to continue solving the puzzle of the room and escaping to the next. Each level has a lever that has to be activated in order to advance to the next level.
